products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: G | MONOMER COLD ROOM, G1 | HIGH VELOCITY WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection , testing & commissioning of Deluge valve with wet pilot trim assembly,fitted with strainer, drain valve, pressure gauge, Pressure Switch, flame proof 3/2 way Solenoid Valve, air filter regulator etc. & manual release unit. The valve shall be electro-pneumatic type. 80 mm NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: trim assembly: wet pilot, fitted with: strainer, fitted with: drain valve, fitted with: pressure gauge, fitted with: pressure switch, fitted with: flame proof 3/2 way solenoid valve, fitted with: air filter regulator, release unit: manual, type: electro-pneumatic

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: G | MONOMER COLD ROOM, G1 | HIGH VELOCITY WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing and commissioning of GI "C" Class(Heavy Class)  pipes conforming to IS 1239 with threaded or grooved fittings with  including cutting  pipes to correct lengths, providing fittings like elbow,tee,reducer and welding flanges to pipe, fixing with clamps to MS brackets / hangers, steel supports as per drawing.  Rate shall be inclusive of Zinc chromate primer over that 2 coats red enamel paint as per Fire authorities requirement over all above ground pies. Rates to be inclusive of  all complete as per specifications 80 NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: class: heavy, standard: IS 1239(indian standard 1239), fittings: threaded or grooved, fittings included: elbow, tee, reducer, welding flanges, fixing: clamps to MS brackets / hangers, supports: steel, primer: zinc chromate, paint: 2 coats red enamel, as per: fire authorities requirement, application: above ground pipes
